definition: to explore a mystery/to probe the unknown
to explore/to search out/to scout/to visit/to stretch forward

sentences.english: Then, they will find a way to search and know that person well.
sentences.chinese: 然后，探秘将会找到能更好发掘和了解的道路。

sentences.english: Let your Spring Festival holiday to start a journey of exploration incan civilization.
sentences.chinese: 让您的春节假期开始一次探秘印加文明之旅。

sentences.english: Jewel Quest Solitaire and Super Mahjong explore two games collection.
sentences.chinese: 宝石探秘纸牌与超级麻将探索两款游戏的合集。

sentences.english: Visitors can explore areas where the crew slept.
sentences.chinese: 游客还可以探秘船员们睡觉的地方。

definition: to seek by inquiry or search/to call on/to visit
to seek unusual scenery or places
to have a taste of/to realize/to appreciate
to explore/to go on an expedition/adventure
to interview people on the spot/to go around and make inquiries
to look/to have a glimpse at/to observe (sth's splendor)
see 追根溯源[zhui1 gen1 su4 yuan2]
to make a pilgrimage (to visit a holy site)/to go on a sightseeing tour
